name: The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth 2
name_original: The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth 2
description:
The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth 2 is a strategy game developed by Electronic Arts Los Angeles. It was originally released in 2006. It was published by Electronic Arts. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth 2 on Xbox 360 and PC.
